title: Who’s still read Enid Blyton's book today? - Quora

response.answer_text: Enid Blyton had been the introductory fiction to a lot of us. My niece was recently introduced to Enid Blyton. The Famous Five & Secret Seven series sell online and are stacked in several book stores. Her stories would still strike a chord with young readers. And adults to, no better choice for a nostalgic read.
